response.original_title: Dzerassa Tuganova. The light of an undying star
response.overview: A documentary about People's Artist of the USSR and North Ossetia, director of the equestrian circus troupe Dzerassa Tuganova, the first soviet female equestrian, who, despite her age, continues the work of her father, Mikhail Tuganov.
response.title: Dzerassa Tuganova. The light of an undying star
